g.inkscape:label: A penultimate glacial monsoon record from Hulu Cave and two-phase glacial terminations - Supp

text.tspan: . Monthly precipitation (dashed line, from Nanjing meteorological observatory) and weighted monthly
(heavy and thin lines, data from IAEA/WMO, 2001 and Zhen et al., 1983)). The weighted monthly
observatories in southeastern China (indicated in Figure DR1) are also plotted for comparison (gray lines). The vertical arrow indicates
the onset of the summer monsoon in the Nanjing area. The precipitation during pre-onset of summer monsoon conditions is characterized
O of precipitation during the post-onset of summer monsoon (June - September) is much lighter.
A penultimate glacial monsoon record from Hulu Cave and two-phase glacial terminations
